title: Genioo Workforce Solutions presents revolutionary diagnostic tools: Company Health Index (CHI) through its Instant Health app and Talent Fit Index (TFI) at HR Technology Conference & Expo Las Vegas, O
text:
Genioo Workforce Solutions 
NEW YORK, Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Genioo Workforce Solutions (GWS), a revolutionary company, which provides smart change management and capability building technologies and services, will be demonstrating the Company Health Index , through its Instant Health Check app and the Talent Fit Index at HR Technology & Expo Las Vegas , October 18-21. 
GWS has been working with leading CEOs and other Group Executive members over the past several years to develop diagnostic technologies, which enable leaders to diagnose, with certainty and precision, how to concretely improve their workforce, based on quantitative insights and very tangible improvement measures. 
"The landscape for workforce management is changing and C-Suite executives want to be able to diagnose fast and in a concrete manner, what they need to improve their organizations. And, from there, they want to be able to initiate targeted and measureable projects that allow them to improve performance and stay ahead of competition," explained Klaus Hammer, Commercial Lead for GWS. 
GWS will feature two new and innovative technologies at HR Tech: -- Company Health Index (CHI), an Instant Health Check App, diagnoses company performance and health in 8 key dimensions. It identifies potential areas of weakness, qualifies them and then provides benchmarks to define relative status and to prioritize actions. -- Talent Fit Index (TFI) is an online recruiting assessment that matches ideal profiles with candidates by measuring analytical thinking capability, as well as personality traits and connects them to specific job requirements. TFI provides integrated, instantaneous recommendations on the best applicants for a given position and an objective comparison of candidates. 
"GWS diagnostics allow me to see, with surgical precision, what needs to be addressed and where in my organization. In this way, I am able to know exactly what I need to do to improve," commented a GWS client, who is the global head of HR of a leading pharmaceutical company. 
Attendees of HR Tech can learn more by visiting the GWS booth #1959. 
For more information, visit the Genioo Workforce Solutions website genioows.com , or contact Klaus Hammer, k.hammer@genioo.com , +41 (0)79 139 03 58, or Rene Limacher at r.limacher@genioo.com , +1 978 457 6888.
